mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.variety_id AS "varietyInfo.id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", su.name AS "user.name", bvi.name as "varietyInfo.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = a.user_id LEFT join biz_variety_info bvi on bvi.id=a.variety_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_variety_user_info( id, variety_id, user_id, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{varietyInfo.id}, #{user.id}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_variety_user_info SET variety_id = #{varietyInfo.id}, user_id = #{user.id}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
